context.description: A dictionary for specifying the customized context for stack operations

disable_rollback.description: A boolean specifying whether a stack operation can be rolled back.

environment.description: A map that specifies the environment used for stack operations.

files.description: Contents of files referenced by the template, if any.

parameters.description: Parameters to be passed to Heat for stack operations.

timeout.description: A integer that specifies the number of minutes that a stack operation times out.
